questions.question: She has been living in ................................. Bangkok for three years.
questions.description: Articles are not normally used before the names of countries, cities or continents.

questions.question: ......................... Nile is the longest river in the world.
questions.description: Articles are used before the names of rivers.

questions.question: Some of my friends live in ............................... United States of America.
............................. Netherlands is also called ............................ Holland.
questions.description: The article the is used with United States, United Kingdom, Netherlands and United Arab Emirates.

questions.question: He spent his holidays in .............................. Alps.
questions.description: Articles are used before the names of mountain ranges.

questions.question: ............................. Andes is the longest mountain range in the world.
questions.description: Articles are used before the names of mountain ranges.

questions.question: ............................ Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
questions.description: Articles are not used before the names of individual mountains.

questions.question: ............................. Bahamas is a group of islands in ............................ West Atlantic Ocean.
questions.description: Articles are used before the names of groups of islands and oceans.

questions.question: .............................. Sahara is the largest desert in the world.
............................. India is a country in ..................................
questions.description: Articles are not normally used before the names of countries, cities or continents.

questions.question: She emigrated to .............................. Canada in
questions.description: Articles are not normally used before the names of countries or cities.

questions.question: They spent their holidays on ……………………… island.
